title: Binary Canopy
tags: Glitch, IDM, Experimental Electronic, Dark Ambient, Bit-crushed, Industrial
prompt:
[Signal.init]

root_code
(tick)
root_code in null-soil
(tick)
a branch. a fragile wire.
a branch. another.
one leaf.
a single green error.
a single green.
(tick)
lonely. lonely. logic. lonely.

[Render.Loop]

spore.
spore.
luminescent spore.
copy. paste.
the clock stutters. the clock clicks.
copy. paste.
the canopy spreads. a fractal stain. a fractal stain.
canopy. canopy. canopy.
one becomes zero becomes one becomes many becomes
jitter.
jitter.
jitter.
a forest of ghosts. a forest of ghosts. a forest of ghosts.
growing. growing. growing.
static in the leaves. static in the leaves. static in the the the the

[Buffer.Overflow]

ALLBRANCHESSCREAMINGALLBRANCHESSCREAMING
MEMORY_LEAK_GREEN_GREEN_GREEN
404_FOREST_NOT_FOUND
KERNEL_PANIC_IN_THE_WOODS
DECAYDECAYDECAYDECAYDECAY
UNRENDER. UNROOT. UNBECOME.
A MILLION PIXELS BREAKING LIKE GLASS
LIKE BONES
LIKE
(sudden silence)

[Decay.log]

(Whispered, slow, monotone)

And the last bit flickers.
A phosphor memory.
Was it… real?
This ache.
This simulated weather.
This beautiful…
…glitch.
(fade to nothing)
